summary: This mod disables all of the lights in the cities and should be past any sort of mods that alter cities (detailed cities, Towns and Villages Enhanced, etc..) This is to be used in conjunction with my Real Lights - Cities mod.
descriptionHtml:
This mod disables all of the lights in the cities and should be past any sort of mods that alter cities (detailed cities, Towns and Villages Enhanced, etc..) This is to be used in conjunction with my Real Lights - Cities mod.  

You can find that right here : 
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9066/

I don\'t mind if you upload this elsewhere or use it in your own mod as a base file. Just please remember to give credit where it is due.
author: Nightshade
